titles.title: My Soul Is Anchored In The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul is anchored in the Lord.
My soul is anchored in the Lord.
I won't go back in sin.
The Lord has been my friend.
I've left this world behind.
The Lord is now my guide.
He is my mighty tower, when in the darkest hour.
My soul is anchored in the Lord.
